translation.text: The ignorant, blind man calls himself the guru, but to whom can he show the way? ||3||

transliteration.text: gurū sadāē agiānī andhā kis ōh mārag pāē .3.

melody.description: If there is a perfect simile for Raag Gujari, it would be that of a person isolated in the desert, who has their hands cupped, holding water.
